items.badge_description: You’ve unlocked today’s Recappd badge! Any drink you check in helps power your faction as we race toward choosing the next Untappd icon. Explore your year in beer at Recappd and come back tomorrow! Recappd is presented by Crescent Canna: Try the bestselling THC drinks in the country and get FREE THC gummies with your purchase. Add any THC drink to your cart and use code: GUMTAPPD. Shop Now >

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 60 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 13!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 95 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 20!
Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 135 different beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 28.
